title: Top Floor Modern Rehab 2 Bed close to Lincoln Square!
map_address: 4535 North Leavitt St near West Wilson
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 259098335', 'Rent: $1,675 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Check out our 360 Tour and Video Tour:', '<URL>', 'https://youtu.be/PGSeMUe8_eo', '- Lovely Top floor Modern rehab apartment', '- Lots of natural light.', '- close to Ravenswood and Lincoln Square', '- Remodeled bathroom w/ attractive tile work', '- updated kitchen w/ granite counter tops & SS appliances (DW inc.)', '- NEW windows - Bright and sunny apartment', '- Larger queen sized bedroom', '- smaller second bedroom (fits a full bed - no problem)', '- ample closet space', '- hardwood floors', '- FREE HEAT!', '- laundry in building', '- steps to Lincoln Square and all it has to offer', '- 2 blocks to Wells Park', '- only a few blocks to El and 2 bus lines', '- assigned building engineer', '- 24 hour emergency call center', '- no security deposit', 'Leavitt & Wilson', 'ICM Properties Inc. is a professional management company since 1966.', 'Call ICM Properties, Inc. for details or to arrange a showing @ 773 549-5443', 'To see a list of other ICM properties in your price range go to our website @', '<URL>', 'FEATURES', 'Building Engineer', 'Close to EL', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Gas Stove', 'Granite Countertops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Heat and Hot Water', 'Laundry in Building', 'Modern appliances', 'Modern Bathrooms', 'Modern Rehab', 'Near Bus Lines', 'New Windows', 'On-site Laundry', 'Refrigerator', 'Renovated Kitchen', 'Stainless Steel Appliances']
